General.Name: HUANLEJIA Food Group Co. Ltd.
General.Description: HUANLEJIA Food Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of canned food and beverages in China. It provides canned fruits, vegetable protein drinks, fruit juice drinks, lactic acid bacteria drinks, coconut water drinks, thick coconut milk, electrolyte sports drinks, and vitamin energy drinks. HUANLEJIA Food Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Zhanjiang, China.
